plugins.name: project-spec
plugins.description: Generate project specifications with SPEC.md as core file and optional SPEC/ supplements. Features existing repo detection, gap analysis, design overhaul, and git-aware sync.

plugins.name: suno-composer
plugins.description: Creative or guided workflow for composing Suno AI songs. Vision-first mode (Claude proposes, you react) or guided mode (step-by-step wizard). Features 29 artist profiles, J-pop tier presets, Suno v5 techniques, adaptive preference learning, file output, Chrome integration, album mode, variations, and song continuations.
